viewData.name: MSI 15.6" GS65 Stealth Gaming Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy MSI 15.6" GS65 Stealth Gaming Laptop featuring 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core, 16GB DDR4 | 256GB NVMe PCIe SSD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 144 Hz Display. Review MSI Stealth
viewData.long_description: The 15.6" GS65 Stealth Gaming Laptop from MSI is designed for gamers who favor portability just as equally as performance. Specs-wise, it's equipped with a 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H six-core processor, 16GB of DDR4 memory, a 256GB NVME PCIe SSD, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 graphics card. Thanks to its dedicated graphics card, you'll be able to enable additional graphical options and turn up in-game settings to enjoy games at their best. Additionally, its 15.6" 1920 x 1080 display features a 144 Hz refresh rate for fluid gaming. Should you need more storage, you can connect external storage solutions using its multiple USB ports. Other integrated features include Thunderbolt 3, HDMI, Mini DisplayPort, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, a backlit keyboard, a webcam, microphones, speakers, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro (64-Bit).
